Use of Non-Special Categories of Personal Information\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM uses and maintains non-special categories of personal information for the following purposes:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b354e843-f3a1-48e1-a3d3-985bf92da5ed/PL1.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":780,\"height\":837}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM relies on the following legal grounds for the collection, processing, and use of employee personal information:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/88d7a5eb-54c7-4ed8-91c6-6f1b172e6388/PL2.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":780,\"height\":668}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The basis for you providing personal information and special categories of personal information partly comes from a statutory requirement, partly from a contractual requirement under your employment contract, and partly from a need for the information to carry out the employment relationship with you. In general, you must provide the personal information and special categories of personal information, except when we indicate that certain information is voluntary (e.g., in connection with employee satisfaction surveys). Not providing your personal information and special categories of personal information may prevent EPAM from carrying out the employment relationship with you and, in some circumstances, may require EPAM to terminate your employment.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
